title: Inquiry-Based Groundwater Numerical Modeling Project Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic quantitative mathematics and geology knowledge, no programming experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing pedagogical competencies in groundwater modeling for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can create 3D terrain models explaining the geometric requirements of the CVFD method via a smartphone app
Learners can produce a 5-minute presentation explaining the adaptive principles of Voronoi grids generated through the inquiry process to peers
Learners can write a report identifying three or more causes of errors in the modeling process by reflecting on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
